name: bdev-al-xml-doc
description: Generate XML documentation comments for AL source code and create markdown documentation from it.

commands.title: AL DOC: Generate markdown documentation for directory

enumDescriptions: After entering '///' IntelliSense will suggest XML documentation comments.
After entering '///' the standard XML documentation is directly inserted.
Disable XML documentation comment actions. Do not perform any action after entering '///'.
al-xml-doc.DocumentationBehavior.description: Specifies the behavior for inserting the XML documentation comment after entering '///' in an AL source code file.

al-xml-doc.DocumentationExportPath.description: Specifies the path where the created markdown documentation files should be stored.

al-xml-doc.DocumentationExportVerbose.description: Specifies whether detailed information should be output during markdown documentation creation.

enumDescriptions: Completely disables the object XML documentation check.
Missing XML documentations will be reported as Information.
Missing XML documentations will be reported as Warning.
Missing XML documentations will be reported as Error.
al-xml-doc.CheckObjectDocumentationInfor.description: Specifies whether object documentations should be checked and undocumented objects reported.

enumDescriptions: Completely disables the procedure XML documentation check.
Missing or unnecessary XML documentations will be reported as Information.
Missing or unnecessary XML documentations will be reported as Warning.
Missing or unnecessary XML documentations will be reported as Error.
al-xml-doc.CheckProcedureDocumentationIn.description: Specifies whether procedure documentations should be checked and undocumented procedures reported.

enumDescriptions: Global procedures.
Local procedures.
Internal procedures.
Protected procedures.
Procedures with [BusinessEvent], [IntegrationEvent] or [InternalEvent] declaration.
Procedures with [EventSubscriber] declaration.
Trigger procedures (e.g. OnAfterGetRecord()).
Procedures in Test codeunits with [Test] declaration.

al-xml-doc.CheckProcedureDocumentationFo.description: Specifies the list of procedure types (e.g. event publisher, tests) checked.

enumDescriptions: Procedures which can be accessed by any other code in the same module and in other modules. This is the default value.
Procedures which can be accessed only by code in the same module, but not from another module.
Procedures which can be accessed only by code in the same object, but not from another object or an extending object.
Procedures which can be accessed only by code in the same object, but not from another object.

al-xml-doc.CheckProcedureDocumentationFo.description: Specifies the accessibility level of the procedures to be exported as markdown documentation files.

al-xml-doc.AskEnableCheckDocumentationFo.description: Specifies whether a confirmation will appear to enable procedure documentation for each workspace.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
